name: Traveler-Anemo
desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you.
The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
Hold: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
Elemental Absorption: If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing Anemo DMG each 0.5 seconds, 9 times.
Elemental Absorption If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal 30.7% additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.
basic_talent.talent2_desc: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

sof.sof1_desc: Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc:
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
